greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000720(A323075(n)).
comment: One less than the restricted growth sequence transform of A323075.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: For all odd primes p, a(2^k * p - 2^(k+1) + 2) = a(A000079(k) * p - A000918(k+1)) = A000720(p) for k >= 0. - After _David A. Corneth_'s similar observation for A323075.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 08 2019
